elementSpec.desc: documents the notation and the datum used for geographic coordinates expressed as content of the geo element elsewhere within the document.

attDef.desc: supplies a commonly used code name for the datum employed.

valItem.desc: a pair of numbers to be interpreted as latitude followed by longitude according to the World Geodetic System.
the values supplied are geospatial entity object codes, based on Universal Transverse Mercator coordinates
the value supplied is to be interpreted as a British National Grid Reference.
the value supplied is to be interpreted as latitude followed by longitude according to the European Datum coordinate system.
